name: State | 07 Daft
description:
Daft provides the listener with a sense of freedom, feeling and finesse. It is the seventh song from the debut album, State. 

The work and animations featured in the State series represents the rebirth as an artist and is the culmination of five years of work. 

The album and animated series allowed a sense of liberation to create and make the Bases project what it is today. This work serves as the foundation. This is the seventh animation in the series and it will not be minted elsewhere. 

Music by Darryl Kirchner, Marco Salvaggio
Artwork and Animation by Darryl Kirchner
